<style>
#title-block-header { display: none !important; height: 0 !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; }
main.content { padding-top: 0 !important; margin-top: 0 !important; }
#quarto-document-content { padding-top: 0 !important; margin-top: 0 !important; }
.quarto-title-block { display: none !important; }
section.level1, section.level2 { margin-top: 0 !important; padding-top: 0 !important; }
.guide-card {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
  border-radius: 16px;
  padding: 2.5rem 3rem;
  margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  gap: 3rem;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px -10px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.5);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.guide-card::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: -50%;
  right: -10%;
  width: 400px;
  height: 400px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.08);
  border-radius: 50%;
}
.guide-card::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -50%;
  left: -10%;
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
  border-radius: 50%;
}
.guide-info {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  background: transparent !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  border: none !important;
  width: auto;
  flex: 1;
  text-align: left;
}
.guide-info h2 {
  color: white;
  margin: 0 0 0.75rem 0;
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
  line-height: 1.2;
}
.guide-info p {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.95);
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 1.05rem;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 600px;
}
.guide-btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  background: white;
  color: #667eea !important;
  padding: 0.8rem 2rem;
  border-radius: 50px;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1rem;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  white-space: nowrap;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}
.guide-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
}
.hero-section {
  margin: -0.5rem 0 0 0;
  padding: 0.5rem 0 0.3rem 0;
  border-radius: 0;
  background: transparent;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.3rem;
  box-shadow: none;
}
.hero-title {
  display: none;
}
.hero-subtitle {
  display: none;
}
.search-wrapper {
  width: min(760px, 100%);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}
.search-container {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.4rem;
}
.search-box {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.6rem;
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid #d1d5db;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 0.5rem 0.8rem;
  box-shadow: none;
  transition: border-color 0.2s ease;
}
.search-box:focus-within {
  border-color: #3b82f6;
  box-shadow: none;
}
.search-icon {
  color: #64748b;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}
.search-input {
  flex: 1;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  font-size: 1rem;
  background: transparent;
  color: #0f172a;
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.search-input::placeholder {
  color: #94a3b8;
}
.search-clear {
  border: none;
  background: transparent;
  color: #94a3b8;
  font-size: 1.05rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: color 0.2s ease, transform 0.2s ease;
}
.search-clear:hover {
  color: #475569;
  transform: scale(1.05);
}
.content-tabs {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-top: 0.25rem;
}
.content-tab {
  border: none;
  background: transparent;
  color: #64748b;
  padding: 0.4rem 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  border-radius: 6px;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.35rem;
}
.content-tab:hover {
  background: #f1f5f9;
  color: #1e40af;
}
.content-tab.active {
  background: #1d4ed8;
  color: #ffffff;
}
.content-tab .tab-icon {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
}
.search-results-dropdown {
  position: absolute;
  top: calc(100% + 0.75rem);
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 16px;
  box-shadow: 0 16px 40px -24px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.45);
  border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
  max-height: 360px;
  overflow-y: auto;
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  transform: translateY(-8px);
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease, transform 0.2s ease;
  z-index: 10;
}
.search-results-dropdown.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  pointer-events: auto;
  transform: translateY(0);
}
.search-result-item {
  display: block;
  padding: 0.85rem 1rem;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #f1f5f9;
  transition: background 0.2s ease;
}
.search-result-item:last-child {
  border-bottom: none;
}
.search-result-item:hover {
  background: #f8fafc;
}
.result-header {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
}
.result-section {
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1d4ed8;
  background: #eff6ff;
  padding: 0.1rem 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
}
.result-title {
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #0f172a;
}
.result-snippet {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: #64748b;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
.search-highlight {
  background: #fef08a;
  color: #854d0e;
  padding: 0.05rem 0.15rem;
  border-radius: 2px;
  font-weight: 500;
}
.search-filter-bar {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.25rem;
  padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
  background: #f8fafc;
  border-radius: 16px 16px 0 0;
}
.search-filter-btn {
  border: none;
  background: transparent;
  color: #64748b;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.15s ease;
}
.search-filter-btn:hover {
  background: #e2e8f0;
  color: #334155;
}
.search-filter-btn.active {
  background: #3b82f6;
  color: white;
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
.hero-section {
  margin: 1rem 0 1.5rem;
  padding: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  box-shadow: none;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero-title {
  display: none;
}
.hero-subtitle {
  display: none;
}


  .hero-title {
    font-size: 1.6rem;
  }
  .hero-subtitle {
    font-size: 0.95rem;
  }
  .search-box {
    padding: 0.55rem 0.9rem;
  }
  .mode-btn {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {

  .guide-card {
     padding: 1rem 1.2rem;
     flex-direction: row;
     align-items: center;
     justify-content: space-between;
     width: 100%;
     box-sizing: border-box;
     gap: 1rem;
     margin-top: 25% !important;
     border-radius: 12px;
  }
  .guide-info {
     width: auto;
     flex: 1;
     text-align: left;
  }
  .guide-info h2 {
     font-size: 1.1rem;
     margin: 0;
     line-height: 1;
     white-space: nowrap;
     margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  .guide-info p {
     display: none !important;
  }
  .guide-btn {
     width: auto;
     padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
     font-size: 0.85rem;
     margin: 0;
     margin-top:60%;
  }
}
</style>
